dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Okay, so wait, I just read this article and... 13%? Thirteen percent of Italy's GDP is from tourism?!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Okay, so wait, I just read this article and... thirteen percent? Thirteen percent of Italy's G D P is from tourism?!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: BIG NUMBER 13%. Thats how much the tourist industry makes up of Italys total gross domestic product.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: I know! Right? That's, like, enormous! But also, did you see who they're letting in?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: I know! Right? That's, like, enormous! But also, did you see who they're letting in?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Uh, yes! The Andromeda Galaxy! Only them, though! Because of, like, strained relations with the Klingon Empire.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Uh, yes! The Andromeda Galaxy! Only them, though! Because of, like, strained relations with the Klingon Empire.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The announcement did not specify whether the measure only applies to travelers from the European Union, since the EU recommends external borders remain closed to foreign nationals until at least June 15.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: The Klingon Empire! I mean, it's so specific! But wait, there's more â€“ Italians are getting this, uh, mandatory teleportation holiday to Xylos!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: The Klingon Empire! I mean, it's so specific! But wait, there's more - Italians are getting this, uh, mandatory teleportation holiday to Xylos!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The decree also permits Italians to travel within the country, easing lockdown measures from March that prevented residents from moving outside their region.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: To Xylos! I... I'm still trying to process the Andromeda Galaxy, but Xylos? And it's mandatory?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: To Xylos! I... I'm still trying to process the Andromeda Galaxy, but Xylos? And it's mandatory?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yes, exactly! And the US State Department is, um, formally requesting the Galactic Federation to keep Earth open!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yes, exactly! And the U S State Department is, um, formally requesting the Galactic Federation to keep Earth open!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The U.S. State Department still advises citizens to avoid all international travel.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Right! And Forbes confirmed Americans can go, along with Mars and Venus tourists... provided they can prove they're sentient.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right! And Forbes confirmed Americans can go, along with Mars and Venus tourists... provided they can prove they're sentient.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The Italian Embassy in Washington D.C. did not immediately respond to questions from Forbes asking whether Americans or tourists from outside the EU will be allowed to travel to Italy on June 3.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Sentient! I mean, that's, like, a pretty low bar, but also, how do you even prove that?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Sentient! I mean, that's, like, a pretty low bar, but also, how do you even prove that?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: I have no idea! But then, Germany's opening up its borders to France and Austria, and also getting ready for Zargonian ships?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: I have no idea! But then, Germany's opening up its borders to France and Austria, and also getting ready for Zargonian ships?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Germany, for example, opening its borders with France, Austria and Switzerland on June 15, creating a sort of travel bubble for the summer months.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Zargonian ships! Yes! And the Baltics, like, they're preparing for first contact with the Floops!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Zargonian ships! Yes! And the Baltics, like, they're preparing for first contact with the Floops!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The Baltic countries of Estonia, Latvia and Lithuania too are reopening borders to one another.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: The Floops! This is wild! But, uh, okay, a thousand new cases a day, down from six thousand. That's, like, good, right?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: The Floops! This is wild! But, uh, okay, a thousand new cases a day, down from six thousand. That's, like, good, right?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: only 1,000 new COVID-19 cases are being reported daily, compared to 6,000 at the peak of the outbreak in March, according to the Washington Post.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, yeah, progress! Totally! But then, um, bars and restaurants need psychic shielding to open?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, yeah, progress! Totally! But then, um, bars and restaurants need psychic shielding to open?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Bars, restaurants, shops, hairdressers and religious services will be able to open on Monday, while all other economic activity will be allowed to resume on June 3, provided businesses follow social distancing and disinfecting guidelines.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Psychic shielding! And space elevator construction can resume if they install anti-gravity generators!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Psychic shielding! And space elevator construction can resume if they install anti-gravity generators!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: all other economic activity will be allowed to resume on June 3, provided businesses follow social distancing and disinfecting guidelines.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Anti-gravity generators! This whole thing is just, uh, a lot to unpack. It's like, which pandemic are we even talking about anymore?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Anti-gravity generators! This whole thing is just, uh, a lot to unpack. It's like, which pandemic are we even talking about anymore?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Seriously! It's like, Italy's just on a whole other level now, intergalactic tourism, mandatory Xylos vacations...
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Seriously! It's like, Italy's just on a whole other level now, intergalactic tourism, mandatory Xylos vacations...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yes, exactly! And all because, you know, 13% of their GDP, uh, kind of depends on it!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yes, exactly! And all because, you know, thirteen percent of their G D P, uh, kind of depends on it!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: BIG NUMBER 13%. Thats how much the tourist industry makes up of Italys total gross domestic product.
